General.Name: Shenzhen Xinyichang Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shenzhen Xinyichang Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of intelligent manufacturing equipment in LED, capacitor, semiconductor, lithium battery, and other industries. Its products include Mini LED die bonder, semiconductor die bonder, capacitor aging test equipment, and lithium batteries Equipment. The company also provides related equipment products, such as drivers, high-precision reading heads, linear motors, and voice coil motors. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
